alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 01 at 2:54AM CDT until May 01 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Subfreezing temperatures early this morning and again tonight into early Tuesday morning ranging from 30 to 32 degrees. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM CDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.
